body:
When trying to install M4 with PGI, I ran into a problem. `make` would crash and `spack-build.out` would contain dozens of lines like:

```
builtin.o: In function `xnmalloc':
/tmp/ajstewart/spack-stage/spack-stage-Mus3U5/m4-1.4.17/src/../lib/xalloc.h:104: multiple definition of `xnmalloc'
m4.o:/tmp/ajstewart/spack-stage/spack-stage-Mus3U5/m4-1.4.17/src/../lib/xalloc.h:104: first defined here
```

After submitting a [bug report](http://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/bug-gnulib/2016-03/msg00006.html) with the developers of M4, they provided me with this patch to get things working.
title: Add patch to allow PGI to build M4
